node.meta_title: Key West, FL: Integrated Communications with CivicPlus®
node.title: Key West, Florida Leverages CivicPlus® Civic Experience Platform for Integrated Communications Management

node.solutions: Solution: Implemented CivicPlus's website, 311 and citizen relationship management, and emergency mass notification solutions.

node.meta_title: Sandy City UT Wins Innovation Award
node.title: Sandy City, UT Communications Team Wins Best of State Award
node.challenge: What is the Utah Best in State Award Competition? The Best of State Awards were created to recognize outstanding individuals, organizations, and businesses.
node.solutions: What Makes for a Winning Nomination? The Best of State Judges look for organizations that: - Excel in their endeavors - Use innovative approaches or methods - Contribute to a better quality of life in the state
node.result: Sandy City's Key to Success: Sandy City Communications leads with the mindset of “thinking like a citizen.”
